skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places an extra hit if this attack is critical. The extra hit is always a normal hit.

skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns. Places a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn if the target is under a [Block Buffs] debuff.
skills.name: Creeping Doom
